entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 7 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 20
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 11
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
